body_content.explanation: in a way that shows you are pleased and satisfied, because you or people connected with you have done or got something good :
examples: It is good to see people peacefully and pridefully asserting their identity.
I spent several years on the board of the company and I look back on that time very pridefully.

body_content.explanation: in a way that shows you think you are better or more important than other people :
examples: Some say he was pridefully trying to take credit for something others had done.
Before the race he had been boasting pridefully that no one could beat him.
